df-wun
blocks.content: The class of all weak universes. A weak universe is a nonempty transitive class closed under union, pairing, and powerset. The advantage of weak universes over Grothendieck universes is that one can prove that every set is contained in a weak universe in ZF (see ~ uniwun ) whereas the analogue for Grothendieck universes requires ~ ax-groth (see ~ grothtsk ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: df-wunc
blocks.content: A function that maps a set ` x ` to the smallest weak universe that contains the elements of the set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: iswun
blocks.content: Properties of a weak universe. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm iswun(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cwun), w3a(wtr(c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cwun, w3a(wtr(c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))), w3a(wtr(cv(hs0)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wral(s0, cv(hs0), w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))))
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wtr(cv(hs0)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wral(s0, cv(hs0), w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))), wtr(c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))))
  treq(cv(hs0), c0)
  neeq1(cv(hs0), c0, emptycls)
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cuni(cv(s0)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cpw(cv(s0)))
  raleqbi1dv(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-wun(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wtr(c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c0, (â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ hs0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ hs0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ hs0, { s0, s1 } âˆˆ hs0)), (â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c0, { s0, s1 } âˆˆ c0)))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c0, â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ hs0, P(s0)âˆˆ hs0, âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ hs0, { s0, s1 } âˆˆ hs0), â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0, P(s0)âˆˆ c0, âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c0, { s0, s1 } âˆˆ c0))
  eleq2(hs0, c0, â‹ƒ s0)
  eleq2(hs0, c0, P(s0))
  raleqbi1dv(s1, hs0, c0, { s0, s1 } âˆˆ hs0, { s0, s1 } âˆˆ c0)
  eleq2(hs0, c0, { s0, s1 })
  df-wun(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((Tr(c0)âˆ§ c0 â‰  âˆ… âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(â‹ƒ s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ P(s0)âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c0, { s0, s1 } âˆˆ c0)))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)

}

blocks.name: wuntr
blocks.content: A weak universe is transitive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: wununi
blocks.content: A weak universe is closed under union. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm wununi(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c0, c1, w0, wcel(cuni(c0), c1), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1))
  eleq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  3syl(w0, wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(c1, cwun), wral(hs0, c1, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))))
  simp3d(wcel(c1, cwun), wral(hs0, c1, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))), wtr(c1), wne(c1, emptycls))
  ibi(wcel(c1, cwun), w3a(wtr(c1), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(hs0, c1, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))))))
  iswun(hs0, hs1, c1, cwun)
  ralimi(hs0, c1, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1))
  simp1(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cuni(c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm wununi(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ â‹ƒ c0 âˆˆ c1)

  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c1)
} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c0, c1, w0, â‹ƒ c0 âˆˆ c1, â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c1)
  eleq1d(â‹ƒ hs0, c1, â‹ƒ c0, hs0 = c0)

  3syl(w0, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c1, â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c1), c1 âˆˆ WUni, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c1,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c1, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c1))))

  ibi(c1 âˆˆ WUni, (Tr(c1)âˆ§ c1 â‰  âˆ… âˆ§ âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c1,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c1, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c1)))))
  iswun(hs0, hs1, c1, cwun)
  ralimi(hs0, c1, (â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c1, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c1)), â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c1)
  simp1(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c1, P(hs0)âˆˆ c1, âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c1, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(â‹ƒ c0 âˆˆ c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: wunpw
blocks.content: A weak universe is closed under powerset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm wunpw(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cpw(c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c0, c1, w0, wcel(cpw(c0), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1))
  eleq1d(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1, cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)
  3syl(w0, wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(c1, cwun), wral(hs0, c1, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))))
  simp3d(wcel(c1, cwun), wral(hs0, c1, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))), wtr(c1), wne(c1, emptycls))
  ibi(wcel(c1, cwun), w3a(wtr(c1), wne(c1, emptycls), wral(hs0, c1, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))))))
  iswun(hs0, hs1, c1, cwun)
  ralimi(hs0, c1, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1))
  simp2(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cpw(c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

  simp3d(c1 âˆˆ WUni, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c1,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c1, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c1))), Tr(c1), c1 â‰  âˆ…)
  ibi(c1 âˆˆ WUni, (Tr(c1)âˆ§ c1 â‰  âˆ… âˆ§ âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c1,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c1, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c1)))))
  iswun(hs0, hs1, c1, cwun)
  ralimi(hs0, c1, (â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c1, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c1)), P(hs0)âˆˆ c1)

blocks.name: wunelss
blocks.content: The elements of a weak universe are also subsets of it. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: wunpr
blocks.content: A weak universe is closed under pairing. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm wunpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  syl21anc(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2))))
  3syl(w0, wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2))), wcel(c2, cwun), wral(hs0, c2, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c2), wral(hs1, c2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2)))))
  simp3d(wcel(c2, cwun), wral(hs0, c2, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c2), wral(hs1, c2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2)))), wtr(c2), wne(c2, emptycls))
  ibi(wcel(c2, cwun), w3a(wtr(c2), wne(c2, emptycls), wral(hs0, c2, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c2), wral(hs1, c2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2))))))
  iswun(hs0, hs1, c2, cwun)
  ralimi(hs0, c2, w3a(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c2), wral(hs1, c2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2))), wral(hs1, c2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2)))
  simp3(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), c2), wral(hs1, c2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2)))
  rspc2va(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c1, c2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2), wcel(cpr(c0, c1), c2), wcel(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), c2))
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c2, cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  preq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), c2, cpr(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  preq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), c2))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cpr(c0, c1), c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wunpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ { c0, c1 } âˆˆ c2)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c2 âˆˆ WUni)

  ibi(c2 âˆˆ WUni, (Tr(c2)âˆ§ c2 â‰  âˆ… âˆ§ âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c2,(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c2, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c2)))))
  iswun(hs0, hs1, c2, cwun)
  ralimi(hs0, c2, (â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ P(hs0)âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c2, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c2)), âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c2, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c2))
  simp3(â‹ƒ hs0 âˆˆ c2, P(hs0)âˆˆ c2, âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c2, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c2))
  rspc2va(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c1, c2, { hs0, hs1 } âˆˆ c2, { c0, c1 } âˆˆ c2, { c0, hs1 } âˆˆ c2)

blocks.name: wunun

blocks.name: wuntp
blocks.content: A weak universe is closed under unordered triple. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm wuntp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(ctp(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cwun))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  syl5eqel(ctp(c0, c1, c2), c3, cun(csn(c0), cpr(c1, c2)), w0)
  tpass(c0, c1, c2)
  wunun(csn(c0), cpr(c1, c2), c3, w0)
  syl5eqel(csn(c0), c3, cpr(c0, c0), w0)
  dfsn2(c0)
  wunpr(c0, c0, c3, w0)
  wunpr(c1, c2, c3, w0)
}

} = {

  dfsn2(c0)
  wunpr(c0, c0, c3, w0)
  wunpr(c1, c2, c3, w0)
}

blocks.name: wunop

thm wunco(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

} = {
  wunss(ccom(c0, c1), c2, cxp(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(ccom(c0, c1))), w0)
  wunxp(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(ccom(c0, c1)), c2, w0)
  wunss(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), c2, cdm(c1), w0)
  wundm(c1, c2, w0)

  relco(c0, c1)
  relssdmrn(ccom(c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: r1wunlim
blocks.content: The weak universes in the cumulative hierarchy are exactly the limit ordinals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: wunex2
blocks.content: Construct a weak universe from a given set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: uniwun
blocks.content: Every set is contained in a weak universe. This is the analogue of ~ grothtsk for weak universes, but it is provable in ZF without the Tarski-Grothendieck axiom, contrary to ~ grothtsk . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm uniwun() {
  |- wceq(cuni(cwun), universe)
} = {
  mpgbir(hs0, wceq(cuni(cwun), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cwun)))
  eqv(hs0, cuni(cwun))
  mpbir(wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cwun)), wrex(hs1, cwun, wss(csn(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))
  ax-mp(wrex(hs1, cwun, wss(csn(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), universe))
  snex(cv(hs0))
  wunex(hs1, csn(cv(hs0)), universe)
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cwun)), wrex(hs1, cwun, wss(csn(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs1, cwun, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  eluni2(hs1, cv(hs0), cwun)
  rexbii(hs1, cwun, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))
  snss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(cwun))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cwun)
}

blocks.name: wunex3
blocks.content: Construct a weak universe from a given set. This version of ~ wunex has a simpler proof, but requires the axiom of regularity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

thm wunex3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, cwun), wss(c0, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cr1, co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com)))
} = {
  jctil(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cwun), wss(c0, c2))
  syl6ss(c0, c2, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  r1rankid(c0, c1)
  sseqtr4i(cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)), c2, cfv(cr1, co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com)))
  mp2(wss(cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(cr1, co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com))), wcel(co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com), con0), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com)))
  mpbi(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com)), wcel(emptycls, com))
  peano1()
  mp2an(wb(wcel(emptycls, com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0), wcel(com, con0))
  oaord1(cfv(crnk, c0), com)
  r1ord2(co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com), cfv(crnk, c0))
  eqeltri(c2, cwun, cfv(cr1, co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com)))
  mp2an(wcel(cfv(cr1, co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com)), cwun), wcel(co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com), con0), wlim(co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com)))
  mp2an(wcel(co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com), con0), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0), wcel(com, con0))
  oacl(cfv(crnk, c0), com)
  mp2an(wlim(co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0), wa(wcel(com, con0), wlim(com)))
  rankon(c0)
  pm3.2i(wcel(com, con0), wlim(com))
  omelon()
  limom()
  oalimcl(cfv(crnk, c0), com, con0)
  r1limwun(co(cfv(crnk, c0), coa, com), con0)
}

blocks.name: wuncval
blocks.content: Value of the weak universe closure operator. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm wuncval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cwunm, c0), cint(crab(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cwunm, c0), cint(crab(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  fvmptd3(hs0, cwunm, c0, cint(crab(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0)))), universe, cint(crab(s0, cwun, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  df-wunc(hs0, s0)
  inteqd(crab(s0, cwun, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), crab(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabbidv(s0, cwun, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(c0, cv(s0)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  elex(c0, c1)
  sylib(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cint(crab(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0)))), universe), wne(crab(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0))), emptycls))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, c1), wne(crab(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0))), emptycls), wrex(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0))))
  wunex(s0, c0, c1)
  rabn0(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0)))
  intex(crab(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cint(crab(s0, cwun, wss(c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: wuncid

blocks.name: wunccl
blocks.content: The weak universe closure of a set is a weak universe. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
